DOC.brief_summary: Fibromyalgia ( FMS ) syndrome express chronic widespread body pain lead reduced physical function frequent use health care service . Exercise train commonly recommend treatment . The purpose study determine whether supervised resistance muscular exercise ( RME ) walk program ( WP ) effective treatment FMS decrease pain . The practical RME reduces pain participant FMS .

DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate compare effectiveness supervise resistance muscular exercise ( RME ) , walk program ( WP ) control group ( observation ) woman FMS 16 week , decrease pain . Participants undergo assessment include medical questionnaire assess FMS symptom baseline , 8 week , 16 week 28 week .
